title: Comprehensive ordinance codes
context: [§46-2.1] Comprehensive ordinance codes. All ordinances which have been duly enacted and not repealed by counties having a population in excess of 100,000 persons shall be compiled, consolidated, revised, indexed and arranged as a comprehensive ordinance code which shall be published within one year after June 5, 1970 and at least once every ten years thereafter. [L 1970, c 46, §1] Revision Note &ldquo;June 5, 1970&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the passage of this Act&rdquo;.
